mapper.select: select * from t_order where member_id=#{memberId} and setmeal_id=#{setmealId} and orderDate = #{orderDate}
select count(1) from t_order where orderDate = #{reportDate}
select count(1) from t_order where orderDate = #{reportDate} and orderStatus='已到诊'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_order WHERE orderDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_order WHERE orderDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate} AND orderStatus = '已到诊'

select s.name,IFNULL(o.value,0) setmeal_count, IFNULL(o.value,0)/(select count(id) FROM t_order ) proportion,s.remark from t_setmeal s left join (select setmeal_id,count(id) value from t_order group by setmeal_id) o on s.id = o.setmeal_id order by setmeal_count desc limit 0,3

select o.setmeal_id setmealId,date_format(o.orderDate,'%Y-%m-%d') orderDate,o.orderType, s.`name` setmeal,m.`name` member from t_order o,t_setmeal s,t_member m where o.setmeal_id = s.id and o.member_id = m.id and o.id = #{id}
